prompt1.content: Answer below question;if it is a single choice question, you should only choose an option as the answer.

Answer below question;if it is a single choice question, you should only choose an option as the answer.
[example]question:Who will call you by your nickname baby?[this is a single-choice question,you should only choose from:Andy;Rachel;David;William;I don't know]
Your answer:
David
[example]question:To what extent do you agree that Andy Johnson is empathetic?[this is a single-choice question,you should only choose from:agree;disagree;I don't know]
Your answer:
agree
